00036  * lustre/obdclass/uuid.c
00037  *
00038  * Public include file for the UUID library
00039  */
00040 
00041 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_CLASS
00042 
00043 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00044 #include <obd_support.h>
00045 #include <obd_class.h>
00046 
00047 static inline size_t consume(size_t nob, __u8 **ptr)
00048 {
00049         size_t value;
00050 
00051         LASSERT(nob <= sizeof(value));
00052 
00053         for (value = 0; nob > 0; --nob)
00054                 value = (value << 8) | *((*ptr)++);
00055         return value;
00056 }
00057 
00058 #define CONSUME(val, ptr) (val) = consume(sizeof(val), (ptr))
00059 
00060 static void uuid_unpack(class_uuid_t in, __u16 *uu, size_t nr)
00061 {
00062         __u8 *ptr = in;
00063 
00064         LASSERT(nr * sizeof(*uu) == sizeof(class_uuid_t));
00065 
00066         while (nr-- > 0)
00067                 CONSUME(uu[nr], &ptr);
00068 }
00069 
00070 void class_uuid_unparse(class_uuid_t uu, struct obd_uuid *out)
00071 {
00072         /* uu as an array of __u16's */
00073         __u16 uuid[sizeof(class_uuid_t) / sizeof(__u16)];
00074 
00075         CLASSERT(ARRAY_SIZE(uuid) == 8);
00076 
00077         uuid_unpack(uu, uuid, ARRAY_SIZE(uuid));
00078         sprintf(out->uuid, "%04x%04x-%04x-%04x-%04x-%04x%04x%04x",
00079                 uuid[0], uuid[1], uuid[2], uuid[3],
00080                 uuid[4], uuid[5], uuid[6], uuid[7]);
00081 }
00082 EXPORT_SYMBOL(class_uuid_unparse);
